titleStmt.title: Whereas the Right Honourable the Lord High Chancellor hath this morning signified to this court, that His Majesty takes notice and is displeased, that the streets of this city are no better kept in paving and cleansing ...
titleStmt.author: City of London (England).
Shorter, John, d. 1688.

notesStmt.note: Title from first three lines of text.
At head of title: Shorter mayor. Martis xxvij.̊ die Martij 1688. Annoq; regni Regis Jacobi Secundi, Angliæ, &c. quarto.
Date of publication suggested by Wing.
Reproduction of original in the Guildhall, London.
